item.title: TCP Study for Interviews
item.description: What is TCP TCP is a full-duplex, byte-stream protocol based on the IP protocol. TCP provides end-to-end accurate transmission. Acknowledges each byte Handles poor network conditions Timeout retransmission Congestion control Efficiency improvement Uses sliding window protocol TCP is a connection-oriented protocol. Since it is connection-oriented, how is this connection established? That is, the following question is how to establish a virtual link using a three-way handshake.
